title: How to Make Cheesy Fries

steps.headline: Put foil on a cookie sheet.
Spread out the frozen french fries.
Put cheese on top of the fries.
You may add bacon (cooked bacon or bacon bits) if desired.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Bake in the oven for 350 degrees for 20-30 minutes, or until the fries are thoroughly cooked and the cheese is melted.

text: Put foil on a cookie sheet.  Spread out the frozen french fries.  Put cheese on top of the fries.  You may add bacon (cooked bacon or bacon bits) if desired.  Add salt and pepper to taste.  Bake in the oven for 350 degrees for 20-30 minutes, or until the fries are thoroughly cooked and the cheese is melted.
